name: Alpha Homora
description: Alpha Homora is the first leveraged yield farming product in DeFi and first product by Alpha Finance Lab. Users can lever their positions and boost their returns by borrowing collateral supplied by Alpha Homora lenders.

en.name: Alpha Homora
en.description: Alpha Homora is the first leveraged yield farming product in DeFi and first product by Alpha Finance Lab. Users can lever their positions and boost their returns by borrowing collateral supplied by Alpha Homora lenders.

fr.name: Alpha Homora
fr.description: Alpha Homora est le premier produit de yield farming à effet de levier dans la DeFi et le premier produit d'Alpha Finance Lab. Les utilisateurs peuvent tirer parti de leurs positions et augmenter leurs rendements en empruntant des garanties provenant des prêteurs sur Alpha Homora.

es.name: Alpha Homora
es.description: Alpha Homora es el primer producto de agricultura de rendimiento apalancado en DeFi y el primer producto de Alpha Finance Lab. Los usuarios pueden apalancar sus posiciones y aumentar sus rendimientos tomando prestadas garantías proporcionadas por los prestamistas de Alpha Homora.

de.name: Alpha Homora
de.description: Alpha Homora is the first leveraged yield farming product in DeFi and first product by Alpha Finance Lab. Users can lever their positions and boost their returns by borrowing collateral supplied by Alpha Homora lenders.

pt.name: Alpha Homora
pt.description: Alpha Homora é o primeiro produto de agricultura de rendimento alavancada em DeFi, e o primeiro produto de Alpha Finance Lab. Usuários podem alavancar suas posições e aumentar seus retornos ao tomar emprestado garantias disponibilizadas pelos usuários fornecedores em Alpha Homora.

el.name: Alpha Homora
el.description: Alpha Homora is the first leveraged yield farming product in DeFi and first product by Alpha Finance Lab. Users can lever their positions and boost their returns by borrowing collateral supplied by Alpha Homora lenders.

tr.name: Alpha Homora
tr.description: Alpha Homora, DeFi'deki ilk kaldıraçlı verim çiftçiliği ürünü ve Alpha Finance Lab'in ilk ürünüdür. Kullanıcılar, Alpha Homora kredi sağlayıcıları tarafından sağlanan teminatları ödünç alarak pozisyonlarını kaldırabilir ve getirilerini artırabilir.

vi.name: Alpha Homora
vi.description: Alpha Homora is the first leveraged yield farming product in DeFi and first product by Alpha Finance Lab. Users can lever their positions and boost their returns by borrowing collateral supplied by Alpha Homora lenders.

zh.name: Alpha Homora
zh.description: Alpha Homora 是 Alpha Finance Lab 推出的首款产品，也是 DeFi 领域的第一个杠杆挖矿产品。用户可以用自己的 LP 仓位作为抵押品在 Alpha Homora 上借款，来实现杠杆挖矿。可借出来的资产是由 Alpha Homora 的存款人提供的。

hi.name: Alpha Homora
hi.description: Alpha Homora is the first leveraged yield farming product in DeFi and first product by Alpha Finance Lab. Users can lever their positions and boost their returns by borrowing collateral supplied by Alpha Homora lenders.

ja.name: Alpha Homora
ja.description: Alpha HomoraはDeFiで初めてのレバレッジイールドファームプロダクトであり、Alpha Finance Labの初めてのプロダクトです。ユーザーはAlpha Homoraの貸し手が供給する担保を借りることで自分のポジションにレバレッジをかけ、リターンを高めることができます。
